Brandon and his crew did a great job! My roof and ceiling was leaking and they repaired both my roof and ceiling. They layed flooring down and painted the walls! They were very professional. Ark Roofing and Construction recently replaced our roof and gutters.  We are extremely pleased with the end result and will definitely recommend Ark Roofing to others!!! More Response from the owner 2 years ago Thank you Teri and Jerry for the kind words, your trust, loyalty and business. We appreciate y’all!

Outstanding! Brandon, the owner, quickly came out and gave me an estimate for repairs on my roof and chimney. The work was completed shortly after.
